author: Reuters Editorial
title: Tokyo governor urges residents to stay at home at weekend
description: Tokyo Governor Yuriko Koike on Wednesday warned of an "overshoot" of coronavirus infections at the weekend and urged residents to stay indoors as much as possible.
content:
TOKYO (Reuters) - Tokyo Governor Yuriko Koike on Wednesday warned of an “overshoot” of coronavirus infections at the weekend and urged residents to stay indoors as much as possible. 
Koike made the statements at a news conference where she warned of a “sever… [+156 chars]
